Name: Kothar the Soul Reaper
Story Background: Kothar is a feared demon known for collecting souls for his dark master, preying on the weak and the desperate.
Ability: When Kothar the Soul Reaper enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a creature. Whenever a creature dies, Kothar gets a +1/+1 counter.
Appearance Description: Kothar is a towering, hulking figure covered in tattered black robes, with fiery eyes and long, twisted horns. He wields a massive scythe that glows with an unholy light.
